titles.title: To deauthorize a portion of the navigation project for Weymouth-Fore and Town Rivers, Massachusetts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/1/1996--Introduced. Deauthorizes a specified channel portion of the project for navigation, Weymouth-Fore and Town Rivers, Massachusetts, previously authorized by the River and Harbor Act of 1965.
